articles.description: The vivo X100s looks sleek with a 7.89mm thin profile, flat display, and flat sides. We have some exclusive photos of the upcoming vivo X100s. We...
articles.content: We have some exclusive photos of the upcoming vivo X100s. We previously heard that vivo is going with a new, flatter design and moving on from the curvy X100, and these photos confirm it. Our source … [+1034 chars]

articles.title: New Ray-Ban | Meta Smart Glasses Styles and Meta AI Updates - Meta
articles.description: We’re adding new styles, video calling with WhatsApp and Messenger, and Meta AI with Vision, so you can ask your glasses about what you’re seeing and get helpful information.
articles.content: Our second-generation smart glasses, in partnership with EssilorLuxottica, have been flying off the shelves theyre selling out faster than we can make them. And just in time for sunglasses season, we… [+3164 chars]
